name: Halse Lodge Noosa Heads
description:
Halse Lodge re-opened its doors in November 2024 after full renovation.  Originally built in the 1880s, every corner tells a story inherently tied to the land. This iconic heritage listed two-storey backpackers has been carefully re-designed and revived in leisurely comfort. 
 
Connect with others in a casual, modern, light-filled dorm, or find solace in a private suite—perfect for friends and couples.  Rest, relax, and capture core moments amidst vibrant interiors that celebrate the spirit of Australiana.
 
Halse Lodge embodies the true energy of Noosa, and features all the modern, luxurious comforts – sleep in air-conditioned comfort with brand-new cozy hotel quality mattresses, and enjoy new bathrooms with lux amenities, as well as access to laundry and communal kitchens.
 
Enjoy full access to our Halse Lodge community spaces – yoga on the deck, table tennis tournaments and long games of pool, evenings soundtracked by classic vinyls and surfboards strewn in the sand. We’re only a short stroll from the golden sands of Noosa Main Beach, your playground for swimming, surfing, or simply soaking in the sun. Explore the vibrant local markets, indulge in fresh seaside eats, or embark on a scenic hike through the breathtaking Noosa National Park.
 
There’s a spot to drink cold beer or natural wine under a canopy of greenery, and share a meal with friends—new and old. The communal spaces invite you to stay a little longer, savouring the company and slowly sipping away in the sun.
 
Come and stay—and experience an atmosphere that’s distinctly, and unmistakably, Australian.
 
BOOKING A DORMITORY? PLEASE READ IMPORTANT INFORMATION BELOW:

Our dormitories have a strict age limit of 18-40. Alternatively, we have Private Rooms and Suites available which are suitable for all ages over 18.

Terms & Conditions
BOOKING A DORMITORY? PLEASE READ IMPORTANT INFORMATION BELOW:

Our dormitories have a strict age limit of 18-40. Alternatively, we have Private Rooms and Suites available which are suitable for all ages over 18.

NON-REFUNDABLE BOOKINGS: You will be charged the full amount at time of booking and cancellations are not allowed.
FREE CANCELLATION BOOKINGS: You have up to 48 hours (2pm)  prior to arrival to make changes to your booking.
All Visa and Mastercard cards will incur a 1.38% surcharge fee.
All Amex cards will incur a 3.08% surcharge fee. 
The Hostel may cancel the Booking if the payment details provided by the Customer are invalid or insufficient. The Hostel will make all reasonable attempts to contact the Customer for alternative valid details

CHECK IN: 2PM
CHECK OUT: 10AM

ID: You must present a valid passport or drive's license at check-in, failure to do so may result in cancellation of your booking. 

GROUP BOOKINGS: When booking multiple beds in a shared room, we will make a genuine attempt to put people on the same booking in the same room, however, this cannot be guaranteed. Group Bookings over 10 or more people will require prior consent from the hostel.

FOOD AND DRINK: We have a restaurant and bar on site. Guests may not consume or store food and drinks (other than water) in their rooms. Alcohol may not be consumed in any room at any time.

DISABLED GUESTS
The Hostel complies with all laws regulating the treatment of, and provision for, disabled Guests. Guests with any special requirements pertaining to a disability should inform the management team at the Hostel prior to the Arrival Date. Wheelchair access – only some rooms are suitable for wheelchair access. Please check the hostel information or contact the individual hostel directly before making a booking

PRIVACY DETAILS
The Hostel collects and handles your personal information in accordance with our Privacy Policy, so that we can provide and administer our products and services including travel products, processing bookings, payments, check-ins and cancellations and provide you information about these. Without your information, we may not be able to provide you products and services and you may miss out on receiving valuable information from us. If you are located outside of Australia, please be aware that any information you provide to us, will be transferred from your country of origin to Australia and you consent to this transfer. We may disclose your personal information to third party operators of ‘travel deals’ you have booked, to sponsors and partners when you enter a competition or promotion, when you become a member and to third party service providers. These third parties may have servers located overseas such as in the USA and UK and you consent to these disclosures. If you are providing information on behalf of someone else, you confirm that you have authority to do so, and you have given them the information set out in our Privacy Policy and they have not objected to our handling, use and disclosure of their personal information. You have a right to access your personal information that we hold and may ask us to update, correct or delete this. Our Privacy Policy contains more details on your rights and contact details for questions or complaints at https://halselodgenoosa.com/about-us/privacy-policy
